description.en: Rumored to be a forest-dwelling witch. Rarely does she leave the forest village. An abandoned child she found and raised would trigger the wheels of Sherlotta's destiny upon coming of age. While rather overprotective of those close to her、 she has little patience for anyone else.
description.jp:
森に住む魔女と噂されていた女性。
森の村に住んでおり 外には滅多に
出ない。捨てられていた子供を拾って
育てていたが その子供が成人したとき
彼女の運命もまた動き出した。
身内に対してはかなり過保護な一面を見
せつつ 他人には容赦が一切ない。

jp.text: 危ないというか心配というか…\n…ゴニョゴニョ
うむ よくぞ言った\nその心意気や良し
まったく変な言葉ばかり覚えおって
この子の明日のために\nわたしにできることをするまで
おまえがもう\nひとりで立てる姿を見せてくれ
大丈夫だ おまえになら必ずできる

gl.text: It's a big、 dangerous world out there for a child. How can I help but be scared for...
Well、 well. This is much better. I like the new you、 kid.
I have to do this. For that kid's future.
Show me that you can stand on your own two feet.
I know you can do it. I believe in you.

name.jp: ブレイブ攻撃

desc.en: Magic attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Magic attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 魔法攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

name.jp: HP攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

name.jp: クリスタルの輝き

desc.en:
Raises party BRV based on Max BRV
Grants [Light of the Crystal] for 3 turns
No Action Delay
Does not increase turn count
Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

While [Light of the Crystal] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [Tranquil Light]
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Attack
• [HP Attack] becomes [Hurl Staff]
　∟ Raises BRV based on Max BRV
　∟ + Magic BRV + HP attack
　∟ Inflicts [Light of Rejection] for 3 turns

[Light of the Crystal] has the following effects:
• Raises own Attack
• Raises party's Max BRV
• Grants [HP Regen] to party

[Light of Rejection] has the following effects:
• Lowers Initial BRV
• Deals BRV damage
desc.gl:
Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV
Self: 3 turns Light of the Crystal buff
Instant turn rate
Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support
BRV Attack becomes Tranquil Light, HP Attack becomes Hurl Staff while Light of the Crystal buff active
desc.jp:
味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
自身に3ACTION強化効果「クリスタルの輝き」付与
行動負荷がない
総ACTION数に加算されない
召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される
強化効果「クリスタルの輝き」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が「安らぎの光」に
通常「HP攻撃」が「杖をなげる」に変化

name.jp: クリスタルの輝き

desc.gl: Light of the Crystal: Raises party's MAX BRV; restores a certain amount of party's HP; raises own ATK (does not stack)
desc.jp: クリスタルの輝き：味方全員の最大BRVが上昇し HPを一定量回復 自身の攻撃力が上昇（同名の強化効果は重複しない）

name.jp: クリスタルコアの波動

desc.en:
Reduces enemy BRV to 1/5
Raises party BRV based on Max BRV
Grants [Light of Creation] for 2 turns
No Action Delay
Does not increase turn count
Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

[Light of Creation] raises HP damage dealt by party
desc.gl:
Reduces all targets' BRV to 1/5
Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV
Self: 2 turns Light of Creation
Instant turn rate
Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support
desc.jp:
敵全体のBRVを1/5にした後
味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
自身に2ACTION「創造の光」付与
行動負荷がない
総ACTION数に加算されない
召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される

Target: 3 turns Light of Rejection

自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算し

name.jp: クリスタルの輝きエクステンド

desc.en:
When using 「Light of the Crystal」:
- Slightly improves BRV gain based on Max BRV

When using 「Tranquil Light」:
- Moderately improves BRV gain based on Attack

When using 「Hurl Staff」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Moderately raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Light of the Crystal:
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own MAX BRV

When using Tranquil Light:
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on own ATK

When using Hurl Staff:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
desc.jp:
「クリスタルの輝き」使用時

name.en: Crystal Core Wave BRV Up Buff Up Throw Staff+
name.gl: Crystal Core Wave BRV Up Buff Up Hurl Staff+
name.jp: クリスタルコアの波動BRVアップバフアップ杖をなげる＋

desc.en:
When using [Crystal Core Wave]
• Slightly raises BRV gain based on Max BRV
• Adds the following effects to [Light of Creation]
　∟ Slightly raises party's Attack
　∟ Slightly raises party's Max BRV overflow limit for gained BRV

After use, turns [HP Attack], [Throw Staff] to [Throw Staff+]
　∟ Raises BRV based on Max BRV, followed by 3-HIT magic BRV + HP attack
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Inflicts [Light of Denial] for 3 turns
　∟ Reverts to [Throw Staff] or [HP Attack] after use
desc.gl:
When using Crystal Core Wave:
 • Slight boost to BRV granted to party based on own MAX BRV
 • Adds effect to Light of Creation that slightly raises party's ATK, granted BRV limit
 • HP Attack, Hurl Staff becomes Hurl Staff+ after use (increases BRV based on MAX BRV; 3-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; target: 3 turns Light of Rejection; returns to Hurl Staff after use if conditions to become Hurl Staff are met; returns to HP Attack if not)
desc.jp:
「クリスタルコアの波動」使用時
・味方全員への自身の最大BRVに依存した加算量小アップ
・「創造の光」に以下の効果が追加
　-味方全員の攻撃力小アップ
　-味方全員の加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップ
・使用後 通常「HP攻撃」「杖をなげる」が以下の「杖をなげる＋」に変化
　-自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算し
　　3HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
　-対象に3ACTION「拒絶の光」付与
　-使用後「杖をなげる」への変化条件を満たしている場合は
　　「杖をなげる」に そうでない場合は通常「HP攻撃」に戻る

short_desc.gl: Crystal Core Wave BRV Up Buff Up Hurl Staff+: Boost to Crystal Core Wave
short_desc.jp: クリスタルコアの波動BRVアップバフアップ杖をなげる＋：「クリスタルコアの波動」の性能アップ
